alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 8:07PM PST until January 13 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds becoming south 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In California, Modoc County. In Oregon, Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County and Central and Eastern Lake County. This includes Highway 31 from Valley Falls to Summer Lake and the higher terrain including Winter Rim and the Warner Mountains. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 4 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County
